## PlayerService.getSteamId property

Get the SteamdId of a Steam user from the profile vanity URL.

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
getSteamId: (vanityUrl: string) => Promise<string>;
```

## Remarks

The vanity URL is the last part of the Steam profile URL (https://steamcommunity.com/id/<VanityURL>). The Steam Id is returned as a string to overcome the limitation of the the number type.
